validations.field-error_email: Field must be a valid email

notification.default-message-warning: Something you are doing is not recommended
notification.default-message-info: Something is happening. Just want you to know that

main-page.page-description: An easy way to issue certificates for your course
main-page.login-message: To log in, please connect to your MetaMask wallet

main-certificate-banner.title: Issue certificates
main-certificate-banner.description: Upload the certificate image and select the recipient's MetaMask address. The selected user will receive the certificate and will not be able to transfer it to anyone else

mint-page.title: Issue certificates
mint-page.loader-modal-description: Wait until all certificates are created

success-modal.title: Success
success-modal.description: Elit dapibus at egestas odio. Elit dolor non ornare magna.

first-step.title: Upload files
first-step.select-images-description: You can upload up to 100 files
first-step.select-images-title: Drag and drop or Browse file

second-step.description: Upload the table with relation between certificates and their recipients. {link}
second-step.title: Upload the table
second-step.select-table-title: Drag and drop or Browse file

third-step.title: Enter the contract address
third-step.description: Enter the course contract address where certificates will be issued

deployment-confirmation-modal.title: Do you have a smart contract to deploy SBT Certificates?
deployment-confirmation-modal.subtitle: In order to issue SBT certificates for your course, you must have a deployed smart contract on the Polygon network. If you already have such a contract, then click the "Yes, I have" button. If you do not have a smart contract that you want to use or you need another one - click on the "Deploy" button and follow the prompts that appear next

deploy-step.subtitle: In order to deploy a contract, you need to select a contract name. Then click the "Deploy" button, confirm the transaction in MetaMask and pay network fee

deployed-step.subtitle: This is the contract address that you will need later in order to issue certificates for your course. Please copy and save this address.
